Description.Text: The McQuade Group is proud to announce the 2008 opening of The Acorn Hotel. This is a 4 star metro hotel situated in the prominent Park area of Glasgow city centre between Charing Cross and the West End. The hotel is beautifully decorated throughout in a light green/walnut wood decor. The choice of colouring and style presents a very modern and tasteful theme throughout the hotel. Guests can enjoy the proximity of Glasgow city centre and the west end from the doorstep of this new hotel. The Acorn Hotel has been awarded 4 star status by the Scottish Tourist Board. Guests can expect all the facilities. The Acorn Hotel is an upmarket Boutique Hotel and is surrounded by the most delectable eating places of international cuisine.All of the stylish rooms are en suite with power showers and feature a plasma-screen television, GHD hair straighteners and toiletries from the Scottish Fine Soap Company.

Acorn Hotel is only a 5-minute walk from the bustling Sauchiehall Street and 20 minutes walk from Buchanan Street. Central Station is approximately 1 mile away, whilst Glasgow International Airport is 7 miles away.

Single Room - This room has a single bed, ensuite bathroom, hair straighteners, free WIFI, Shower, Safety Deposit Box, TV, Telephone, Radio, Bathroom Amenities, Fan, Toilet, Hairdryer, Wake Up Service/Alarm Clock, Work Desk, Seating Area .
Double Room - This room has one double bed , ensuite bathroom, straighteners, free WIFI, Shower, Safety Deposit Box, TV, Telephone, Radio, Bathroom Amenities, Fan, Toilet, Hairdryer, Wake Up Service/Alarm Clock, Work Desk, Seating Area .
Twin Room - This room has two single beds, ensuite bathroom, straighteners, free WIFI, Shower, Safety Deposit Box, TV, Telephone, Radio, Bathroom Amenities, Fan, Toilet, Hairdryer, Wake Up Service/Alarm Clock, Work Desk, Seating Area .
